title: "‘When the Voice falls over the unhinging will be feral’"
excerpt: "The Voice to Parliament is still close – despite what some polls might suggest – but when it all ends the fallout could be feral, says one commentator. God help us all when the Voice to Parliament fails. The result will likely be closer than current polling suggests. But it is almost certain to fall over – and the unhinging will be feral."
